Reference

Handle dataset snapshots

take_snapshot()

Snapshots datasets and the configuration file

possible_snapshots()

Datasets to snapshot

path_snapshot()

Get path to data snapshots

Handle the configuration file

default_config() example_config() get_config()

Create a path pointing to a configuration file

edit_config()

Edit the default configuration file

show_config()

Show a configuration file

Exported datasets

These datasets are directly accessible when you attach the package.

data_dictionary

Data dictionary

fake_loanbook

A fake loanbook dataset

BENCH.REGIONS

Dataset to bridge from country to all existing bench regions it is in

INDEX.REGIONS

Dataset to identify the equity index regions based on the MSCI factsheets

BicsSectorBridge

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

GROUPS.GOVT

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

RevenueSplit

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

sector.bridge

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

SectorBridge

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

TYPE.EQUITY

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

TYPE.OTHERS

Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

Paths pointing to 2dii's dropbox-folder
